title: Support Main LFT Any Rank
body: Greetings! After everytime I make it to Silver 1-3 I have seemed to find a way to put myself back down in the ranks by moving servers, provisionals putting me down. I moved servers plenty of times and well. This time i'm deciding to stay, unfortunately I do not have any team that I play with so I'm looking for one. Willing do some sort of try out period and whatever, but do take note I CANT play Mid or ADC, but i can do Support, Jungle, Top. Add me ingame :P
